SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
admin controller - the controller that manages the entries database - add entry, delete entry, etc.
BeanConfig
BeanConfiguration class - configure the beans
ContextListener
ContextListener class - listen to context events (start/refresh of application events).
CustomErrorController
this controller handles all exceptions/errors and displays a friendly error page.
Entry
Entry class - represents an entry for the game (category and word).
EntryRepository
EntryRepository interface - create a repository for entries.
Ex5TemplateApplication
Ex5TemplateApplication class - the main class of the application
Ex5TemplateApplicationTests
Ex5TemplateApplicationTests class - test the application
GameController
GameController class - the controller to handle the game logic.
HighscoresController
Highscores Controller class - the controller to handle the highscores list.
LoginController
this controller handles the login page
Record
Record class - represents a record of a user.
RecordRepository
RecordRepository interface - create a repository for records.
RevealedWord
RevealedWord class - the revealed word currently guessed by the user
SecurityConfig
SecurityConfig - configure the security, restrict pages according to roles.
